@ABPNews Why Board of Directors and RBI/ Government allowed China to increase its share in Ambuja Cements and Asian Paints?

As per annual reports of Nifty 50 companies, People's Bank of China increased stake by 25% and 34.3% in @asianpaints and Ambuja Cements, respectively, during FY20. The combined holdings worth Rs.630 crores.  Companies need to work on reducing Chinese stakes.
